name: SpellKeeper
description: SpellKeeper is a unique logic game with dozens of challenging puzzles and beautifully hand-drawn graphics. Take on the role of the Chosen One and save butterflies trapped in magic cocoons. Challenge your brain and free all the butterflies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Standard
